posts.body:
>>edba434b-79d9-410a-b10f-85411d5c93c4

FG&C


BO is working on fixes as we speak;

I read you load and clear, and this is a brand new instance of ZeroNet, not my old instance from before the spam attack.


The winning is commencing!

>>056d239a-614e-427a-9638-aadb7a96d469


You did something right, admin.


I am currently testing a brand new instance of ZeroNet

Grabbed a new ZeroID cert, and hit update;


I have almost half of my old instances posts, and they are loading in fast.


It looks like I already have all the threads in the correct order, posts are just filling in.

Keep up the good work.

>>1a78376a-f5d8-43fb-bb6b-ad3686c2ce75
>Edit: Also as soon as you see this go make a copy of your 1DdPH.../data/users/content.json file and hang onto it. I might need to see some of its text when I analyze changes. Right now I need to get to bed.



Well received, doing it now.

>>1a78376a-f5d8-43fb-bb6b-ad3686c2ce75

Lots of hashed (not clickable 4 digit number links) reply links that go to posts I dont have yet, though, we shall see what I get.

But I have many posts from 8/5 and that was well before you implemented the ZeroID certs.

Brand new instance of ZeroNet as of 8/10 - 3am PST

posts.subject: READ BEFORE ATTEMPTING TO POST
posts.body:
ZeroID fixed the spam issue but made it so users with the wrong certificate might not know they're making posts no one can read.

==IF YOU DO HAVE THE ZeroID FIX==
Post here to see if it's working.


==IF YOU DON'T HAVE THE ZeroID FIX==
1. Go to ZeroID:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz/
I have no idea if it's possible for others to see the "username" you select or if that's only if they're using ZeroNet email. I'm guessing not but just in case use a username generator or otherwise pick something unrelated to any other accounts you might have.
2. Go back to a 08chan page.
2. Click and drag the top-right 0 logo to the left to reveal the menu. Go down to "Identity address (limit used: 0.00kB / 0.00kB)" and select for your new zeroid.bit address to be used with 08chan.
3. Refresh the page. You can now post.

==POST HERE AFTERWARDS SO YOU KNOW YOU CAN BE SEEN==



(re-posted from /vid/)

Lets get this party re-started!

Someone out there reading this, throw me a (you) so I know this isn't getting lost in the ether...

posts.subject: Downloadable Archive Incoming
posts.body:
Okay, fags;

Newfag here, so bear with me...

So, all you refugees that are just landing here, and wondering:

==WTF==

==Where is all the bread?==

==FIRST==

See this thread:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D/?:users/17rEeDwJ1UrHPHSrqspzTQJVPAFFxK8xtS:QResearch:27151099-f982-4d55-8fac-565c8b51a7bc


==NEXT==

Due to the current board settings that now only allow ZeroID certificate ID's:

ALL content that was originally seeded with the old AuthCerts is now ==INVISIBLE== to all new incoming members.


I am currently curating a downloadable zip file, whose contents you will need to place in your ZeroNet data file for this zite:

...ZeroNet\data\1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D\data\users\ 

Once the archive of pre-change data has been placed in your ZeroNet folder, re-start ZeroNet and update 08chan (ZeroHello page).

Once you have done this, you will have access to the ~1,700 crumbs we have gathered in the Q Research General breads that have been baked here.

As well as all the sundry and spoopy threads that have been created here since 8ch got nuked on Aug 5. 


==I WILL EDIT THIS WHEN THE ARCHIVE IS AVAILABLE FOR DL==

>>231a8c12-a973-4709-b7ee-71a0c30d5969

I got a large tranche of old Cert posts on my new instance and then it choked off, and I have not gotten any more old content, still stuck at 'OPTIONAL FILES' Total of 9.8 gigs.
